attributes.action: Claims for Child Benefit to be processed quicker rather than 12 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I HAVE HAD A BABY ON THE 22ND SEPT 09 AND TO DATE 15TH DEC 09 STILL AWAITING PAYMENT.  HOW DO YOU EXPECT PEOPLE TO SURVIVE AND BUY ALL ESSENTIALS FOR THE NEW BABY WITH NO MONEY!
